extendedInfo.description: Taiji is a Chinese cosmological term for the "Supreme Ultimate" state of undifferentiated absolute and infinite potentiality, contrasted with the Wuji "Without Ultimate". Taiji is best known in the West from the name Taijiquan. Here we have the TaiJi symbol in Fire with a 3D cube. Features of this Live Wallpaper include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.Additional feature in pro version unlocked.Auto change of DesignAll additional design are unlockQuick Setting on main screen --selectable
